entry.title: You Have To Try To Get Over the Fear of Failure If You Want To Make Money With Your Computer

link.title: You Have To Try To Get Over the Fear of Failure If You Want To Make Money With Your Computer

entry.content:
Don't Let Your Fears Paralyze You

One of the challenges I faced when I first started taking an intrest in programing and the web was the fear of failure.

The fear of failing and messing things ups can keep you from doing what you want to do in life. Even worse if you let those thoughts linger for too long you'll become paralyzed and you can suddenly feel like your in the passenger seat of your own life.

Lucky for you I've dug myself out of one of those dark depressing holes and can gladly tell you things are not as hard as you percieve them.

Programing Can Be A Lot Easier Than You Think

Programming and code especially the way it's percieved in popular media gives a lot of people the idea that you need to be some high strung math geniuous to do it and that simply couldn't be further from the truth.

The truth is that not all programming requires a high level of understanding. Once you establish yourself with the basics you can chip away at moutains of information to become a full fledge technology proffessional.
entry.summary: The fear of failing and messing things ups can keep you from doing what you want to do. Even worse if you let those thoughts linger for too long you'll become paralyzed and you can suddenly feel like your in the passenger seat of your own life.

entry.title: Finishing Up My Landing Page & Building A Website With ChatGPT & Eleventy

link.title: Finishing Up My Landing Page & Building A Website With ChatGPT & Eleventy

entry.content:
These last couple of weeks I've been focusing on a few things.

Finishing Up the Ad For My Campaign.

I finally got around to finishing my landing page. I'm going to be setting it up with Google Ads in a day or two.

Using ChatGPT To Build A Website With Eleventy

For a while now I've been wanting to move my site over to something a little faster in terms of build time. With some research I was able to find that Eleventy is specifically designed for larger sites. The only thing that's been stoping me is learning a whole new platform.

Earlier this week without thought I went over to ChatGPT.com and began writing.
entry.summary: Finishing up my landing page and using ChatGPT to build an eleventy website.

entry.title: My Pages Are Finally Ranking in Google Search Console, Continuing To Write More Content

link.title: My Pages Are Finally Ranking in Google Search Console, Continuing To Write More Content

entry.content:
Today I wrote some copy for a landing page I'm making. It's an Ad for web services in the La Habra, California area. I also started building out the layout in HTML and styling it. Check out some of the things I've been working on.

La Habra Website Design Webpage

I've been working on styling this page. So Far I've added things like columns and rows with the hopes of making the information easier to consume.

Making Improvements to the About Me Page

Check out the about me page here About Ruben Gutierrez: Website Designer

entry.title: Getting Familiar With New Website, Submitting Website To Google

link.title: Getting Familiar With New Website, Submitting Website To Google

entry.content:
Getting used to this new set-up. I'm really focusing on building resuble code so that things look a little more neat but you know how that goes.

Submitted My Website To Google Search Search Console

Today I spent some time making adjustments to my DNS files. In order to get my website on Google faster I'm going to have to add some files that prove that I'm the owner of my domain 'ruben-gutierrez.com'

entry.title: Writing More Content For My Jekyll Website, Improving the About Me Page

link.title: Writing More Content For My Jekyll Website, Improving the About Me Page

entry.content:
Today I decided that I'm going to be working on improving the about me page on my site.

Changing to Resume Style Rather Than A Portfolio Look

I'm going to be trying to make it look more like a resume than a portfolio, kind of of the same thing but not really.

How It's Changing

I'm going to really focus on being descriptive about my skill level and what it is exactly I know how to do.
entry.summary: I'm going to be trying to make it look more like a resume rather than a portfolio, kind of of the same thing but not really.

entry.title: Using Porkbun, Jekyll, Github, and Vercel To Build & Deploy My New Website

Learning More About DNS FIles

entry.summary: Buying my domain from Porkbun deploying my website using Vercel and Github to Deploy my new website. I'm making a new website so I've decided to use the technologies above to build it and deploy it.
